description: This file defines a React component named ManageCourse that provides an interface for managing course metadata, modules, lessons, and their order within an educational platform's instructor interface. It includes logic for fetching, updating, and creating course elements, as well as reordering modules.

methods.name: saveMeta
methods.description: Saves the current course metadata (title, description, category, level, price, thumbnail URL) to the database.

methods.name: addModule
methods.description: Creates a new module with the specified title and refreshes the module list.

methods.name: moveModule
methods.description: Reorders modules by moving a module up or down in the list, updating the order in the database.

methods.name: addLesson
methods.description: Creates a new lesson in the selected module and prompts the user to use the Content Builder.
